sentences.sentence: ObjectiveTo observe the role of anti-inebriation of Jiejiule.
sentences.translation: 目的观察解酒乐的抗醉、解酒功能。

sentences.sentence: Many drinkers plunge gladly into inebriation as an escape from reality.
sentences.translation: 很多饮酒者乐于陷入到醉酒状态中以逃避现实。

sentences.sentence: Freedom of inebriation seriously affects the learning of college students.
sentences.translation: “醉自由”严重影响当代大学生的求学。
